brainly_data.question: For each statement below, identify the career described. covers any field in which instruments or processes are created to go along with biomedical technology covers any field dealing with medicine, the creation of medicine, and the provision of supplies for the medicine to be used covers any field that helps in analyzing DNA and identifying individuals from DNA samples taken from crime scenes
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: For each statement below, identify the career described. covers any field in which instruments or processes are created to go along with biomedical technology covers any field dealing with medicine, the creation of medicine, and the provision of supplies for the medicine to be used covers any field that helps in analyzing DNA and identifying individuals from DNA samples taken from crime scenes
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: These jobs are geneticists and criminologists!  Geneticists study genes and how they're inherited, seeing where the DNA came from.  Criminologists will supply the samples to the geneticists, as they take them from the crime scene.
